greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of numbers k with 1 < k < n which are relatively prime to n.
comment: Number of nonprincipal Dirichlet characters mod n. - _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Jul 25 2013
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
N. J. A. Sloane, Families of Essentially Identical Sequences, Mar 24 2021 (Includes this sequence)
formula: a(n) = card({k| k prime to n} setminus {k| k divides n}). - _Peter Luschny_, Aug 05 2011
G.f.: -x/(1 - x) + Sum_{k >= 1} mu(k)*x^k/(1 - x^k)^2. - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Mar 16 2017
results.author: _Andrew Weimholt_, Jul 31 2005
ext: Offset set to 1, in accordance to A000010, by _Peter Luschny_, Aug 05 2011
